entry.title: WIND WARNING, Qualicum Beach
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:25 p.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Qualicum Beach Airport 12:00 AM PDT Sunday 9 April 2023
Temperature: 8.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: 6.8°C
Wind: SE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except 80 near the Strait of Georgia overnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain ending late in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 15 mm except 35 mm between Qualicum Beach and Fanny Bay. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 near the Strait of Georgia in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:27 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
